reviewText:
Before you read this please note that the only other reviewer have this 1 star but an excellent review, leading me to believe that this person made a mistake in the amount of stars they have this DVD.
Vasst (the production company that makes this DVD) makes several instructional DVDs. Most are ok with pros and cons. This DVD is excellent. 2 hrs of in and out of every feature of a excellent all around workhorse of a camera. I didn't give it 5 stars because I would really have liked practical suggestions and strategies on using many of the cameras features. Don't get me wrong, it's already 2 hrs long. But I think it needed a real practical side as opposed to just a comprehensive checklist. Even if it meant a follow up video. But an EXCELLENT resource nonetheless.

Two hours of going around the camera.  Very good.
the only thing lacking is the GPS.  He states it is there but nothing on displaying it.
